title: LOB_VALUE() function
sql:
-- valuelob_v2 column is a value LOB
create view agents_v2 as 
    select id id_v2, substr(valuelob, 5, 5) valuelob_v2 
      from agents;

-- valuelob_v3 column is a value LOB
create view agents_v3 as 
    select id id_v3, lob_value(referencelob) valuelob_v3
      from agents;

-- valuelob_v4 column is a value LOB
create view agents_v4 as 
    select id id_v4, lob_value(substr(referencelob, 5, 5)) valuelob_v4 
      from agents;
